hero.title: Scanbots
hero.description: Autonomous drone platform for infrastructure monitoring with AI-powered image recognition, real-time processing, and automated defect detection.

challenge.title: The Challenge
challenge.content: Large-scale infrastructure inspections were costly and risky, and manual methods could not keep up with asset volume. The industry needed a safe, automated system to detect defects quickly and reliably.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.content: Built an autonomous drone platform combining hardware, AI models, and a robust data pipeline to detect defects in real time. The system automated inspections, accelerated reporting, and scaled safely across assets.

backend.title: Backend Architecture
items: Python data pipeline for sensor data

results.title: Results & Impact
results.content: Secured €2M+ in funding and delivered a production-ready platform that reduced inspection costs while improving safety. The system processed massive imagery volumes with real-time defect detection for clients.
